com.smartitengineering.exim.impl
Class DefaultAnnotationConfigScanner

java.lang.Object
  com.smartitengineering.exim.impl.DefaultAnnotationConfigScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClassConfigScanner, ConfigScanner, PackageConfigScanner
public class DefaultAnnotationConfigScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassConfigScanner, PackageConfigScanner

This registrar is responsible for scanning and containing configuration of all resources. Whenever a class is looked up whose package has not been scanned yet, registrar will scanClassForConfig its package to generate cofiguration and while generating it will keep scanning until it reaches the leaves, i.e. in this case association to an object that isn't ResourceDomain

Since:
0.4
Author:
imyousuf

getInstance

public static DefaultAnnotationConfigScanner getInstance()
Get a singleton instance of the default annotation config scanner; it will initialize the singleton instance lazily, i.e. upon first request.

Returns:
The singleton package & class annotation config scanner

getConfiguredResourceClasses

public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class> getConfiguredResourceClasses()
Description copied from interface: ConfigScanner
Returns the collection of classes that are scanned till now. This does not mean that there ain't any other resource it just means that this has been scanned till now.

Specified by:
getConfiguredResourceClasses in interface ConfigScanner
Returns:
Collection of classes whose configurations are available

getResourceConfigForClass

public EximResourceConfig getResourceConfigForClass(java.lang.Class resourceClass)
Retrieves the configuration for the resource class, if its not already generated then it will search the package of the class and generate its configuraiton.

Specified by:
getResourceConfigForClass in interface ClassConfigScanner
Parameters:
resourceClass - The class to scanClassForConfig retrieve configuration for
Returns:
Configuration for the resource; NULL if no resource is available or generateable
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If resource class is null!

getPropertyNameFromMethodName

protected java.lang.String getPropertyNameFromMethodName(java.lang.String methodName)
                                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                         java.lang.NullPointerException
Given a method name it returns the property name for it. Currently it supports methods starting with "get", "is" and "has".

Parameters:
methodName - The method name from which to derive the property name
Returns:
Property name represented by the read accessor
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If prefix is not supported
java.lang.NullPointerException - If method name is null

scanClassForConfig

protected EximResourceConfig scanClassForConfig(java.lang.Class probableResourceClass)
Scan among the class's annotations to find the required configuration for exporting and importing resources.

Parameters:
probableResourceClass - The probable resource domain class.
Returns:
The configuration of the class, null if not annotated with ResourceDomain

scanPackage

protected EximResourceConfig scanPackage(java.lang.Package packageToScan,
                                         java.lang.Class resourceClass)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Scan a package for extracting configurations of resource domains.

Parameters:
packageToScan - Package to scanClassForConfig.
resourceClass - Main class scanClassForConfig requested for
Returns:
The configuration of the resource class, Null if the class is not a domain class or resourceClass is null
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If package is null

scanMembers

protected void scanMembers(EximResourceConfigImpl resourceConfig,
                           java.lang.Class resourceClass)
It will scan all member attributes and behavior based on configuration on the class. It will also scan all inherited attributes and behavior.

Parameters:
resourceConfig - The config representing the domain class
resourceClass - The domain class

scanMethods

protected void scanMethods(EximResourceConfigImpl resourceConfig,
                           java.lang.Class resourceClass)
Scans getter methods for discovering associations of the domain and thier respective configurations. It will only scan public getter methods.

Parameters:
resourceConfig - The config of the domain resource
resourceClass - The domain class

scanGetterMethod

protected void scanGetterMethod(EximResourceConfigImpl resourceConfig,
                                java.lang.reflect.Method method)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Scans a getter method for annotations which is used to cofigure the nature of the export

Parameters:
resourceConfig - The config to populate with configurations
method - The getter method to scan
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If its not a getter method with non-void return type and with a non-zero length bean name length and with no parameter

                          java.lang.Class resourceClass)
Scans fields for discovering associations of the domain and thier respective configurations

Parameters:
resourceConfig - The config of the domain resource
resourceClass - The domain class

Parameters:
